'''''Arina's Nilotpala Lotuses''''' is a weekly [[Reputation Request]] that occurs in [[Sumeru]].

==Steps==
# Give five Nilotpala Lotuses to Arina

==Request Details==
Help Needed:<br>
I've seen a specimen Nilotpala Lotus made by an [[Amurta]] researcher. It's super pretty!<br>
It would be great if I could see one every day in my room. Could someone help me fulfill this wish?<br>
I think {{Color|buzz|5 Nilotpala Lotuses}} would be enough to decorate my entire room.<br>
So could someone, anyone, bring me some Nilotpala Lotuses?

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Arina from Sumeru City needs five Nilotpala Lotuses.}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Arina:''' Which one is better? The Nilotpala Lotus or Sumeru Rose?
:{{DIcon|Quest}} About the Nilotpala Lotuses...
:'''Arina:''' Oh yeah, I posted that commission.
:'''Arina:''' Did you get five Nilotpala Lotuses?
:{{DIcon|Quest}} Here are the Nilotpala Lotuses you wanted.
::'''Arina:''' That's nice of you! You don't see Nilotpala Lotuses as beautiful as these in the desert. I'll have Armin come and take a look at them.
:{{DIcon}} Not yet.
::'''Arina:''' Then it won't be enough for me to decorate my room. I'd ask Armin to check them out.
{{Dialogue End}}
